text: Lawson B. Knott Jr. (April 6, 1912 – May 23, 1998) was an American administrator who served as Administrator of the General Services Administration from 1964 to 1969. He died of respiratory failure on May 23, 1998, in Arlington County, Virginia at age 86. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Administrators of the General Services Administration
title: Lawson B. Knott Jr.
